description:
Chinese students are showing more interest in universities in the United States and Britain for campus tours, as five out of the 10 most popular universities are from the two countries, according to a ranking list issued by biaozhun007.com, a business analysis platform, and travel platform Mafengwo.com.

根据商业分析平台biaozhun007.com和旅行平台蚂蜂窝网联合发布的一份排行榜显示，中国学生对参观游览美国和英国的大学校园更感兴趣。在10所最受欢迎的大学中，有5所来自这两个国家。

Students go on a campus tour, during which visit elite schools or universities, stay on campus or with host families, and go to well-known scenic spots for sightseeing.

学生们参加校园游历活动是为了参观这些精英学校，他们还能在学校里或者和寄宿家庭住上几天，同时还会去一些著名景点游览观光。

Based on three factors – the number of times the name of the university appears in people's travel notes, how high the tourist attractions are ranked and the QS World University Ranking released by educational and careers advice company Quacquarelli Symonds - Stanford University tops the list, followed by the University of Hong Kong and the University of Tokyo.

这份榜单斯坦福大学位列榜首,紧随其后的是香港大学和东京大学。这是基于以下三个因素的考虑：大学的名字出现在别人游记里次数,旅游景点排名以及由教育和职业咨询公司夸夸雷利·西蒙茲发布的QS世界大学排名。

Here is a look at the top 10 overseas universities that Chinese students like for campus tour.

以下是中国学生最喜欢游览校园的十大海外大学。

点击查看第二页

title: 10所中国学生最爱游览的海外顶尖大学
